name: Dreamwalker Maze
description:
Why do we freak out? Trying to answer that question is the inspiration behind this game.

Play as a guardian angel. Place dreamflowers, purify nightmares and discover the deeper reasons behind each character's fear.

Each character is based on a true story.

*Based on Ennegram psychological theory.

Controls:

  • LEFT/RIGHT - Rotate dungeon
  • 1, 2 - Skills
